Blacknightmare:

"Alliance could help its allies a day and kill them next"replied 
Blacknightmare "We must keep an eye in it -And you're right, we 
haven't heard about Ramjet and Destron in a while, should we chat 
with them by comm link?? we have to be friendly terms with them after 
all"

> ::Ender::
>     "That depends entirely on who the Alliance is allied with.  I 
don't think 
> the Destrons will have a problem attacking someone but unless I'm 
mistaken 
> you haven't heard from them in a while."
